sections.title: Chorus
content: Praise the holy Trinity, Undivided Unity;
Holy God, mighty God, God immortal, be adored.

sections.title: Verse 1
content: Sing praise to our Creator, Redeemed of Adam's race
God's children by adoption, Baptized in living grace.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: To Jesus Christ give glory, God's co-eternal Son;
As members of his Body We are in Christ made one.

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Now praise the Holy Spirit Poured forth upon the earth,
Who sanctifies and guides us, Confirmed in our rebirth.
